<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Metrics"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/metrics"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all custom metrics configured for the current site. Custom metrics extend the default SLA measurements with organization-specific performance indicators.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call this endpoint: [GET /api/v1.0/metrics](/docs/api/slas/list-metric-metrics) to list all custom metrics.
2. Use returned metric IDs when configuring SLA definitions or building reports.
3. Create new metrics via [POST /api/v1.0/metrics/new](/docs/api/slas/create-metric) if needed.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [GET /api/v1.0/metrics/types](/docs/api/slas/list-metrics) - List metric type definitions
- [POST /api/v1.0/metrics/for/sla/\{id\}](/docs/api/slas/create-metric-by-id) - Refresh metrics for a specific SLA

  id={"request"}

  children={"Request"}
